modules.description: This module implements buffered byte-stream channels over an unbuffered flow, providing operations to read and write characters, strings, and buffers with support for line-based I/O and precise byte counts. It works with flow implementations that handle raw data transmission, such as network connections, and uses Cstruct.t for efficient buffer management. Concrete use cases include handling HTTP requests over TCP, implementing custom network protocols with message framing, and streaming data with controlled buffering.

This module implements buffered byte-stream channels over unbuffered flows, offering precise control over reading and writing bytes, including line-based operations and exact byte count handling. It works with Cstruct.t buffers and flow implementations like TCP connections. Use it for implementing network protocols, parsing streamed data, or managing buffered I/O over raw transport layers.
